verses.name: Luke 1:35
verses.text: And the angel answered and said unto her, The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God.

verses.name: Luke 1:36
verses.text: And, behold, thy cousin Elisabeth, she hath also conceived a son in her old age: and this is the sixth month with her, who was called barren.

verses.name: Luke 1:37
verses.text: For with God nothing shall be impossible.

verses.name: Luke 1:38
verses.text: And Mary said, Behold the handmaid of the Lord; be it unto me according to thy word. And the angel departed from her.
